welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pangkalpinang, where the beautiful beaches, rich cultural heritage, and delicious seafood await you. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring our charming city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Otak-Otak ASE
restaurants.description: Otak-Otak ASE is a café located in Pangkalpinang.
restaurants.address: JL. Kampung Bintang, Pangkalpinang, Prop. Bangka Belitung

restaurants.name: Acau Martabak "89"
restaurants.description: Acau Martabak "89" is a bakery located in Pangkalpinang.
restaurants.address: Jln. Soekarno Hatta (New Suwandi Electronic), Pangkalpinang, Kepulauan Bangka Belitung

restaurants.name: Mie Akaw
restaurants.description: Mie Akaw is a chinese restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Otak-otak amui
restaurants.description: Otak-otak amui is a asian restaurant located in Pangkalpinang.
restaurants.address: Jl melintas, Pangkalpinang, Kepulauan Bangka Belitung

restaurants.name: Mie koba
restaurants.description: Mie koba is a noodle restaurant located in Pangkalpinang.
restaurants.address: Jl Balai (Samping Mesjid Al Muhajirin), Pangkalpinang, Kepulauan Bangka Belitung

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
